name: Yong Hu
description: Hello, I'm nghuyong, don't ask me the meaning of `ng`. I got B.S. (2018) degree from Jiangnan University. Now my main research interest lies in question answering and dialogue. I am also very interested in the industrialization of AI.

name: Tan Yan
description: Hello, I'm YanTan. I got B.S. (2018) degree from Jiangnan University. Now my main research interest lies in question answering and dialogue. I am also very interested in the industrialization of AI.

name: Ping Jiang
description: My name is Jiang Ping. I got B.S degree from Northeast Forestry University in 2018. Now, my research focuses on Information Extraction, which is a critical procedure for constructing Knowledge Graph. Recently, I'm focused on Relation Extraction.

name: Houjin Yu
description: Hello, I'm Houking. I have been in Beijing Institute of Technology for 5 years and got B.S degree in 2018. I studied in document summarization in postgraduate year 1, and now I'm intrested in knowledge graph.

name: JiaNan Guo
description: My name is JiaNan Guo, a struggling mortal. I am currently a master student at DataHammer Group, supervised by A.P. XianLing Mao. Prior to this, I received my B.S. from Beijing Institute of Technology in 2019. I am interested in hasing techniques, network embedding and natural language processing, particularly, hashing techniques. You are welcome to discuss with me about aforementioned areas.
